title: Budget Item Balance Add Schema

companyUuid.description: The UUID of the company to which the event belongs

entityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity associated with the budget item balance

reason.description: The reason for adding or updating the budget item balance

syncTime.description: The time when the budget item balance was synchronized

budgetItemBalanceSyncGuid.description: The unique Sync GUID of the budget item balance being added or updated

budgetItemDetailSyncGuid.description: The unique Sync GUID of the budget item detail associated with this balance

budgetItemSyncGuid.description: The unique Sync GUID of the budget item associated with this balance

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the budget item balance

amount.description: The amount of the budget item balance

featureTypeCode.description: The feature type code associated with the budget item balance

featureTypeSubCode.description: The feature type sub-code associated with the budget item balance

workflowState.description: The workflow state of the budget item balance

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the budget item balance
